result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡبَأۡسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
result.translation: Ni ukuri, Twebwe Allah Twararungikiye imigwi y’abantu b’aho hambere yawe, Intumwa ziyirarikira kwumvira Imana Allah, maze irazihakana yivuye inyuma, Duca Turayigerageza mu kuyitera ubukene n’ivyago hamwe n’indwara n’amaganya, kugira itakambe yicishe bugufi ku Mana Allah.
